item.title: Coupang第四季度营收达88亿美元，未达分析师预期
item.description: 电商巨头Coupang公司周四公布的数据显示，其第四季度营收同比增长11%，低于分析师预期。【原文：E-commerce giant Coupang Inc on Thursday posted an 11% rise in fourth-quarter revenue from a year earlier, missing analysts' estimates.】

item.title: CoreWeave第四季度营收超出预期
item.description: CoreWeave周四公布的季度营收超出华尔街预期，得益于人工智能热潮推动企业涌向其平台，以获取训练和部署先进AI模型所需的强大计算能力。【原文：CoreWeave beat Wall Street estimates for quarterly revenue on Thursday, benefiting from the artificial intelligence boom that has driven companies to its platform for the massive computing power needed to train and deploy advanced AI models.】

item.title: 戴尔预测2027财年营收将超预期，因人工智能服务器需求持续攀升
item.description: 戴尔周四预测2027财年营收将超出华尔街预期，押注其人工智能优化服务器的需求增长，推动其股价在盘后交易中上涨约6%。【原文：Dell forecast fiscal 2027 revenue above Wall Street estimates on Thursday, betting on growing demand for its artificial intelligence-optimized servers, sending its shares up around 6% in extended trading.】

item.title: LGBTQ+交友应用Grindr营收超预期，押注人工智能驱动增长
item.description: Grindr周四公布的财报显示，其第四季度营收超出预期，并扩大了4亿美元的股票回购计划。这家面向LGBTQ+群体的交友应用正押注人工智能驱动的功能来推动增长。【原文：Grindr on Thursday reported fourth-quarter revenue above estimates and expanded its share repurchase program by $400 million, as the LGBTQ+ dating app bets on artificial intelligence-powered features to drive growth.】

item.title: 英特尔预计因美国纳税季营销支出增加，利润将低于预期
item.description: 英特尔周四预测第三季度利润低于华尔街预期，因其预计将在美国纳税季期间增加营销支出以吸引更多客户。【原文：Intuit forecast third-quarter profit below Wall Street estimates on Thursday, as it anticipates higher marketing spending to attract more customers during the U.S. tax season.】

item.title: Duolingo优先考虑用户增长而非盈利，预计预订量将放缓
item.description: Duolingo周四预测，其第一季度及2026年预订量将低于预期。这家语言学习应用正调整战略以加速用户增长，该公司表示此举将拖累今年的预订量增长和盈利能力。【原文：Duolingo forecast first-quarter and 2026 bookings below expectations on Thursday as the language-learning app shifts strategy toward faster user growth, a move it said will weigh on bookings growth and profitability this year.】

item.title: 《金融时报》报道，拉斯维加斯赌场集团凯撒娱乐正考虑收购意向
item.description: 《金融时报》周四报道称，凯撒娱乐公司正在评估来自多家潜在竞购方的收购要约，其中包括得克萨斯州博彩及酒店业亿万富翁蒂尔曼·费尔蒂塔的报价。【原文：Caesars Entertainment is weighing takeover offers from several potential bidders, including a bid from Texas gaming and hospitality billionaire Tilman Fertitta, the Financial Times reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 墨西哥总统谢恩鲍姆宣布可口可乐将在墨西哥投资60亿美元
item.description: 墨西哥总统克劳迪娅·谢恩鲍姆在社交媒体发文称，可口可乐全球首席执行官恩里克·布劳恩周四在会晤中告知她，该公司将在墨西哥投资60亿美元。【原文：Coca-Cola's global CEO Henrique Braun informed Mexican President Claudia Sheinbaum of a $6 billion investment in Mexico during a meeting on Thursday, Sheinbaum said in a post on social media.】

item.title: 沃什领导的美联储提前降息概率随乐观预期下滑
item.description: 美联储主席提名人凯文·沃什的降息之路可能正逐渐收窄。尽管特朗普总统期待美联储上任即降息，但美国经济前景日益乐观、企业高管信心持续增强，加上投资者注意到央行决策者立场趋于鹰派，这些因素正共同挤压沃什的政策空间。【原文：Federal Reserve chair nominee Kevin Warsh's path to out-of-the-gate interest rate cuts in alignment with President Donald Trump's expectations could be narrowing amid emerging bullishness about the U.S. economy, growing CEO confidence in the outlook, and investors keying off a hawkish shift among the central bank's policymakers.】

item.title: 美联储官员古尔斯比预测今年还将多次降息，但不会很快实施。
item.description: 芝加哥联邦储备银行行长奥斯坦·古尔斯比周四表示，他预测今年晚些时候将多次降息，这使他成为美联储政策制定者中较为"乐观"的一员。但他同时表示，希望美联储在此过程中保持"谨慎"，因为降息可能导致经济过热和通胀加剧。【原文：Chicago Federal Reserve President Austan Goolsbee said on Thursday his forecast for several interest-rate cuts later this year makes him one of the more "optimistic" Fed policymakers, but said he wants the Fed to be "careful" in doing so because it could overheat the economy and inflation.】

item.title: 英伟达预计游戏芯片短缺将持续至年底
item.description: 英伟达高管表示，全球游戏芯片短缺可能持续到今年年底，这预示着视频游戏行业将面临更多困境——该行业因消费者需求放缓导致销售疲软而已不堪重负。【原文：A global shortage of gaming chips could last until the end of this year, an Nvidia executive has said, signaling more pain for the video game industry that is already buckling under weak sales due to slowing consumer demand.】

item.title: 美国监管机构或将向议员披露世界自由银行的申请材料
item.description: 美国国家银行监管机构负责人周四表示，将考虑一项请求，允许国会高级成员审查由特朗普家族支持的加密货币企业World Liberty Financial的银行执照申请。【原文：The head of the national U.S. bank regulator said on Thursday he would consider a request to allow senior members of Congress to review the bank charter application of World Liberty Financial, a crypto venture backed by the family of President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 庞巴迪首席执行官称公司有望在印度提升公务机销量
item.description: 印度改善机场基础设施的举措将为庞巴迪公司提供提升该国公务机销量的机会，该公司首席执行官埃里克·马特尔周四向记者表示。【原文：India's efforts to improve its airport infrastructure will give Bombardier a chance to boost sales of business jets there, chief executive officer Eric Martel told reporters on Thursday.】

item.title: IDC称，受内存价格飙升影响，2026年智能手机市场将面临有史以来最大跌幅
item.description: 国际数据公司周四表示，随着内存芯片价格飙升推高设备成本，全球智能手机市场将在2026年遭遇有史以来最严重的下滑，出货量将跌至十余年来的最低水平。【原文：The global smartphone market is poised to suffer its biggest decline ever in 2026, sinking to a more than decade low in shipments, as surging memory chip prices drive up device costs, the International Data Corporation said on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率跌破6%，但供应仍是关键
item.description: 本周，美国主流30年期固定利率抵押贷款的平均利率时隔三年半首次跌破6%。但经济学家指出，这种改善很可能是暂时的，且仅凭利率下调不足以提振住房需求——除非住房供应量同步增加。【原文：The average rate on the popular U.S. 30-year fixed-rate mortgage fell below 6% this week for the first time in 3-1/2 years, but economists said the improvement was likely temporary and on its own insufficient to boost housing demand unless supply increased.】

item.title: Netflix与Apple TV联手推出F1赛事内容
item.description: Netflix将于五月向美国观众直播加拿大F1大奖赛，作为协议的一部分，其热门纪录片系列《极速求生》第八季将在Apple TV平台上线。【原文：Netflix will broadcast the Canadian Formula One Grand Prix live to U.S. viewers in May as part of a deal that makes season eight of its hit docu-series 'Drive to Survive' available for streaming on Apple TV .】

item.title: 凯雷集团支持的Quest Global计划明年在印度上市，首席执行官表示
item.description: 总部位于新加坡的工程服务公司Quest Global计划在未来12至18个月内在印度上市，其联合创始人兼首席执行官向路透社透露，公司押注能源和国防客户需求的增长将推动业务发展。【原文：Singapore-headquartered engineering services firm Quest Global is looking to go public in India in the next 12 to 18 months, betting on rising demand from energy and defence clients to fuel growth, its co-founder and CEO told Reuters.】

item.title: 普拉达在米兰时装周上将冬季外套叠穿于轻薄连衣裙之上，而扎克伯格的现身则引发了对智能眼镜的热议。
item.description: 普拉达周四在米兰的秋冬时装秀上呈现了刺绣缎面连衣裙、薄纱半身裙和羊毛针织衫，而马克·扎克伯格现身前排引发了外界对其可能与品牌合作开发智能眼镜的猜测。【原文：Prada's autumn/winter show in Milan on Thursday included embroidered satin dresses, sheer skirts and wool sweaters, while the front row presence of Mark Zuckerberg fuelled speculation about a potential smart glasses partnership.】

item.title: 独家：华盛顿敦促叙利亚放弃中国电信系统
item.description: 据三位知情人士透露，美国已警告叙利亚不要在电信领域依赖中国技术，称此举有悖于美国利益并威胁美国国家安全。【原文：The United States has warned Syria against relying on Chinese technology in its telecommunications sector, arguing it conflicts with U.S. interests and threatens U.S. national security, according to three sources familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 解读：特朗普的新"附加费"是否让欧盟比贸易协定时期更糟？
item.description: 欧盟要求美国遵守去年达成的贸易协议条款。此前美国最高法院推翻了特朗普总统的全球性关税政策，特朗普随即以新的全面进口附加费作为回应。【原文：The EU has demanded that the United States stick to the terms of a trade deal they agreed last year after the U.S. Supreme Court struck down President Donald Trump's global tariffs and he responded with a new, across-the-board import surcharge.】

item.title: 据彭博社报道，杰富瑞集团对已倒闭的英国贷款机构MFS的风险敞口达1.35亿美元。
item.description: 据彭博社周四报道，知情人士透露，杰富瑞集团对抵押贷款融资公司Market Financial Solutions（简称MFS）的风险敞口约为1亿英镑（合1.35亿美元）。该公司本周已进入英国破产程序。【原文：Jefferies has an exposure of about 100 million pounds ($135 million) to Market Financial Solutions, or MFS, a mortgage-finance firm that entered a UK form of insolvency this week, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 消息人士称，在海湾地区人工智能热潮中，QST正权衡沙特业务的多种选择，包括出售方案。
item.description: 知情人士向路透社透露，数据中心公司Quantum Switch Tamasuk正考虑战略选择方案，包括出售其沙特业务。该交易可能重新吸引全球收购公司的兴趣，这些公司正寻求分得海湾地区人工智能热潮的一杯羹。【原文：Data-center company Quantum Switch Tamasuk is considering strategic options, including a sale of its Saudi business, four people with knowledge of the matter told Reuters, in a deal that could attract renewed interest from global buyout firms seeking a slice of the Gulf's AI boom.】

item.title: 美国贸易委员会将调查取消中国永久正常贸易地位的影响
item.description: 美国国际贸易委员会周四表示，将就取消中国永久正常贸易地位的经济影响展开为期六年的调查，此举可能导致对中国进口商品加征关税。【原文：The U.S. International Trade Commission said on Thursday it would investigate the economic impact of revoking China's permanent normal trade status over a six-year period, a move that would likely increase tariffs on Chinese imports.】

item.title: 墨西哥阿兹特克电视台宣布启动破产程序
item.description: 墨西哥广播公司TV Azteca周四宣布，其股东已批准启动自愿破产程序，以重组公司财务及债务。该公司由墨西哥商业巨头里卡多·萨利纳斯·普列戈掌控。【原文：Mexican broadcaster TV Azteca, which is controlled by Mexican business magnate Ricardo Salinas Pliego, said on Thursday that shareholders had approved a voluntary bankruptcy process for restructuring the company's finances and liabilities.】

item.title: 女子因社交媒体成瘾起诉Meta和YouTube，预计将在庭审中出庭作证
item.description: 一名加州女子预计将于周四出庭作证，讲述童年时期使用Meta平台的Instagram和谷歌的YouTube如何损害了她的心理健康。她于洛杉矶提起的这场具有里程碑意义的诉讼仍在继续。【原文：A California woman is expected to testify in court on Thursday about how using Meta Platforms' Instagram and Google's YouTube as a child harmed her mental health, as her landmark trial in Los Angeles continues.】

item.title: 先锋集团表示已解决德克萨斯州总检察长及其他州提起的诉讼
item.description: 基金管理公司先锋集团周四表示，已就德克萨斯州及其他州共和党总检察长提起的诉讼达成和解。这些总检察长指控该基金管理公司及其竞争对手通过气候行动主义活动违反了反垄断法。【原文：Fund manager Vanguard Group said on Thursday it has settled litigation filed by the Republican attorneys general of Texas and other states, who had alleged the fund manager and rivals had violated antitrust law through their climate activism.】

item.title: 法官驳回健威公司撤销德州泰诺安全诉讼的请求
item.description: 得克萨斯州一名法官周四驳回了肯维公司（Kenvue）提出的撤诉请求。此前该州总检察长肯·帕克斯顿（Ken Paxton）起诉该公司，指控其在推广泰诺（Tylenol）时隐瞒了孕妇服用该流行止痛药可能导致儿童自闭症及其他风险的真相。【原文：A Texas judge on Thursday rejected Kenvue's bid to dismiss a lawsuit by state Attorney General Ken Paxton accusing the company of falsely marketing Tylenol by concealing autism and other risks to children when pregnant women use the popular painkiller.】

item.title: 德国工会称与特斯拉的纠纷已达成和解
item.description: 德国金属工会（IG Metall）周四发表声明称，该工会与特斯拉就本月早些时候在柏林郊外工厂举行的员工代表会议争议达成和解协议。【原文：Tesla and German union IG Metall reached agreement on Thursday to settle a dispute over a meeting of the works council at the carmaker's plant outside Berlin earlier this month, the union said in a statement.】

item.title: 谷歌推出Nano Banana 2，此前其AI图像生成工具因病毒式传播大获成功
item.description: 谷歌周四发布了其病毒式传播的Nano Banana图像生成模型的继任者，宣称该模型性能更强劲。这家搜索引擎巨头正致力于吸引更多用户使用其人工智能工具。【原文：Google on Thursday unveiled a successor to its viral Nano Banana image generation model, touting faster performance as the search-engine behemoth pushes to attract more users to its AI tools.】

item.title: 苹果寻求驳回针对Siri人工智能的欺诈诉讼，并要求Epic游戏公司撤销禁令
item.description: 苹果公司敦促联邦法官驳回一项拟议集体诉讼，该诉讼指控苹果公司通过夸大其Siri语音助手的人工智能能力，以及虚假宣称其遵守了关于应用销售佣金的禁令，两次欺诈股东。【原文：Apple urged a federal judge to dismiss a proposed class action claiming it defrauded shareholders twice, by overstating the artificial intelligence capabilities of its Siri voice assistant and falsely representing its compliance with an injunction governing commissions on app sales.】
